name: Slug Race!
description:
The only thing stronger than a grandmother's love is the vig on the $25,000 she owes her bookie, and now that bookie has come to collect…

From you!

Granny's made a mess again, and now it's time for you to clean it up…

Or else!

Gambling! Burglary! Granny's Trapped! Go!

(Mobile users can play the game here: Mobile Friendly Slug Race!)
